mySUPERHOME is the new rewards app from SUPERHOME CENTER, designed to make every purchase more rewarding. The app is based on cashback — the more you shop, the more you earn back, helping you save on your future purchases with up to 2% cashback! 

How it works:

Earn cashback: Every purchase at Superhome Center automatically earns you cashback when you scan your app barcode at checkout.
Redeem your cashback: Use your accumulated cashback to pay for your next purchases directly through the app. 
Exclusive app offers:mySUPERHOME members enjoy unique offers and privileges available only through the app.
Track your earnings: View your total cashback in real time in the “Wallet” section of the app. 

SHOP more, EARN more.

mySUPERHOME — your shopping, your rewards

Download our updated app and join thousands of satisfied users who have already transformed their on-the-go shopping experience.

• Easy, quick and simple shopping from your mobile phone! Find your favorite pick among millions of options, through smart filters and effortless navigation! 

• Pay with just one tap using Apple Pay / Google Pay or pay later through our consumer financing program.

• Do your weekly grocery shopping with our Supermarket service. Find delicious recipes and organize your shopping with the "Smart List"!* 

• Sell something you don’t need by simply taking a photo from your mobile phone or find unique used product deals on Skoop!* 

• See product recommendations, videos, buying guides & hot trends tailor made for you! 

• Shoot a video review of your favorite product, upload it directly from your mobile phone and become a Skroutz Creator! 

• And these are just some of the advantages of the Skroutz App! Download it today and upgrade your shopping!

* Available exclusively in Greece.

Do you have a comment?
Send us your feedback and opinion at ios@skroutz.gr

ANSWEAR

Enter the world of premium fashion at your fingertips. 
With the Answear app, shopping becomes an exciting experience – inspiring, fast and convenient. New arrivals every day, exclusive promotions and access to your favorite brands in one app – for her, for him, for kids – from streetwear to luxury collections.

STAY UP TO DATE

Receive notifications about new arrivals, promotions and limited collections before they hit the shops.

FASHION THAT INSPIRES

Discover ready-made outfits and mix them in just a few clicks. See products not only in perfect photos, but also in motion, thanks to video previews. Use the BUY THE LOOK feature with just one click. Browse products from selected premium brands: jackets, coats, shoes, dresses, trousers, blouses, handbags, backpacks, wallets, as well as designer products from the HOME section - for your home and as gifts. At Answear, we dispatch your order from our warehouse and deliver it in one parcel.

FAST, CONVENIENT, PREMIUM

Add to your basket and buy in seconds. Take advantage of app-only discounts, convenient delivery and easy returns. Save your favorite products and create your own inspirational collections.

ANSWEAR CLUB

Join the loyalty program and get real savings with every purchase by unlocking new discount levels.

YOU CAN ALWAYS CHANGE YOUR MIND

Returns are easy. Did the color, size or style turn out to be wrong? You can return purchased products within 30 days. Requesting a return in the app takes literally seconds!

THE HOTTEST PREMIUM BRANDS

Shop products from over 500 selected global brands, including:
UGG • Tommy Hilfiger • Calvin Klein • Guess • Karl Lagerfeld • Polo Ralph Lauren • Hugo • Boss • Gant • adidas Originals • Reebok • Puma • New Balance • Levi’s • Lacoste • AllSaints • Pinko • The North Face and many more.

PREMIUM FASHION – WHEREVER, WHENEVER, ALWAYS

For women, for men, for children and for home design - all products in one place. With Answear, premium fashion is always at your fingertips - whenever you want it and wherever you are.

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

Store mode

Zara QR:
Use your QR on the Zara App for:

Black Friday starts here — score huge deals on the AliExpress app right now. AliExpress brings millions of items across fashion, electronics, home, beauty and more, all in one easy app so you can grab Black Friday discounts, flash sales and app-only coupons.

Find top brands, unique finds and everyday essentials at great prices. Read honest buyer reviews, compare sellers, and use smart search and filters to find exactly what you want. With AliExpress you get personalized recommendations, saved wishlists, price-drop alerts and curated collections tailored to your tastes.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

developer: DSM Grup Danismanlik Iletisim ve Satis Tic. A.S.
description:
Welcome to your ultimate shopping destination where everything you need, from fashion and beauty to home essentials and more, comes together in one place. Enjoy amazing deals, top brands, the latest trends, and so much more!

WELCOME DISCOUNT

First impressions matter, right? That’s why we’ve got an exclusive discount code waiting for you on your first order. Just download Trendyol and claim your welcome treat."

MORE ABOUT THE APP

Trendyol is your go-to shopping platform, making shopping easy and seamless. As you swipe through thousands of global, local and Turkish brands and millions of products, you’ll find a new trend waiting at every scroll. Planning outfits? Tracking orders? Enjoying free returns? It’s all a breeze. Here’s a tip: mark your faves and we’ll let you know when the prices drop. Download the Trendyol app today and start exploring!"

MORE ABOUT TRENDYOL

With our wide selection of clothing, footwear, accessories, home essentials, beauty must-haves, electronics, and more, Trendyol transforms shopping into an experience that’s accessible and budget-friendly. Trendyol Collection translates the latest runway trends into wearable outfits for every style, occasion and budget. Our lines range from a glamorous party selection (Trendyol Party) and a casual jeans collection (Trendyol Denim) to modest fashion looks (Trendyol Modest) and a plus-size collection (Trendyol Curve)."

Now it’s your turn to embrace your unique style from casual and relaxed to elegant and stylish with on-trend fashion pieces for women, men, and kids from Trendyol Collection. Beyond our exclusive brand Trendyol Collection, we also feature some of your most-loved brands such as: Nike, New Balance, Birkenstock, Crocs, Ray-Ban, Skechers, Adidas, Apple, Korkmaz, Samsung, Philips, Almufarrej, Karaca, Home Box, Dyson, Stanley, Lego, Madame Coco, Xiaomi, NA-KD, Converse, Jack & Jones, Dr. Martens, Calvin Klein and more.

Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using the Trendyol app. By accessing or using the app, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

Comprehensive

Quickly search, get product details, read reviews and purchase millions of products available from Amazon and other merchants.

Convenient
Sign in with your existing Amazon account to access your basket, payment and shipping options. No need to create a new account to manage your 1-Click settings and wish lists, track your orders and use your Prime membership benefits. Shop just as you do on the web.

Fast
Compare prices and check availability instantly by scanning a barcode, snapping a picture or typing your search. 

Secure
All purchases are routed through Amazon's secure servers.

Universal
Shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.es, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.cn or Amazon.co.jp, Amazon.sg from a single app.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.
 
For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.com/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.com/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

developer: Lidl Digital International GmbH & Co. KG
description:
LIDL PLUS: Find Food Deals, Grocery Coupons and Shopping Rewards on the Products You Love! The service is aimed at customers who'd like to receive personalised information from Lidl Stiftung about Lidl Plus promotions, as well as offers, products and services from Lidl Companies and selected partners. We personalise this information based on your purchase and usage behaviour of the products and services of the Lidl Companies.

Incredible grocery discounts every time you shop with Lidl! ‘Straight in my basket!’ 

Download, register and save even more. Lidl Plus is our new rewards app, designed to give you discounts on the products you love. 

The service is aimed at customers who'd like to receive personalised information from Lidl Stiftung about Lidl Plus promotions, as well as offers, products and services from Lidl Companies and selected partners. We personalise this information based on your purchase and usage behaviour of the products and services of the Lidl Companies.

Available in Republic of Ireland, Northern Ireland, Great Britain and Malta. 

We’ll send you Lidl coupons based on the products that you love. Simply activate your coupons and scan in store to make incredible savings on your Lidl shopping. 

Every time you shop, you will also get the chance to win amazing prizes*. So what’s not to like? Check out the best things about the Lidl Plus loyalty app and how to use it.

HOW TO GET LIDL PLUS LOYALTY REWARDS:

 - Activate your coupons in the app and scan your digital Lidl Plus Card at the till to redeem and save money on your shop.
 - Scan your digital Lidl Plus Card at the till for the chance to win great prizes* on each store visit!
 -  Never lose a receipt again. You’ll get a purchase summary and a digital copy of your receipt with Lidl Plus.
 -  Never miss another offer. Browse through a digital version of our weekly leaflet in the app.

Plus many more exciting features!

We made this app to reward you for shopping at Lidl and to help you find deals on your favourite foods, drinks and household items. 

From amazing food coupons to saving money on your next shop – Lidl Plus is the app to download if you want to get the best food deals and shopping discounts. We’re always looking to help you enjoy quality products at great prices, so download our free loyalty app and register today and find food deals, shopping rewards and grocery coupons on the products you love.

*This feature is not available in all countries.

When joining the Lidl Plus program, you can allow tracking technology, which helps us to understand how you interact with the app. This includes what pages you visit, what coupons you view, and how long you spend on each page. This tracking allows Lidl Plus to improve the app and provide you with tailored communication, discounts and to participate in relevant surveys.

Data Protection Policy:

Τώρα η online εμπειρία ΙΚΕΑ γίνεται ακόμα καλύτερη με την εφαρμογή IKEA Cyprus.

Η εφαρμογή IKEA Cyprus σας διευκολύνει με τη μοναδική λειτουργία scanning του barcode των προϊόντων. Έτσι, μπορείτε εύκολα και γρήγορα να δημιουργήσετε μία Λίστα Αγορών με τα αγαπημένα σας προϊόντα.

Βρείτε αυτό που σας αρέσει στο κατάστημα, σκανάρετε το barcode του προϊόντος, ενημερωθείτε απευθείας τόσο για τη διαθεσιμότητά του όσο και για το σημείο από όπου μπορείτε να το συλλέξετε ή επιλέξτε να κάνετε online παραγγελία.

Κερδίστε χρόνο που μπορείτε να διαθέσετε σε άλλες δραστηριότητες, σχεδιάζοντας τη Λίστα Αγορών σας ή κάνοντας τις αγορές σας από το σπίτι μέσω της εφαρμογής IKEA Cyprus.

Η εφαρμογή IKEA Cyprus σας βοηθάει:

- να βρείτε το πλησιέστερο κατάστημα ΙΚΕΑ και να ανακαλύψετε τις τρέχουσες προσφορές.
- να ενημερωθείτε σχετικά με την τοποθεσία των καταστημάτων ΙΚΕΑ, τις ώρες λειτουργίας τους και τις ώρες λειτουργίας των Εστιατορίων ΙΚΕΑ.
- να αναζητήσετε  ιδέες και λύσεις για την επίπλωση ή την διακόσμηση του χώρου σας
- να εξερευνήσετε τον πλήρη κατάλογο IKEA και να μάθετε πληροφορίες σχετικές με τα χαρακτηριστικά των προϊόντων όπως διαστάσεις, υλικά κτλ.
- να κατεβάσετε τις οδηγίες συναρμολόγησης για το προϊόν που σας ενδιαφέρει.
- να δημιουργήσετε τον δικό σας λογαριασμό στο ΙΚΕΑ eshop και να τον συνδέσετε με τον IKEA Family λογαριασμό σας.
- να επεξεργαστείτε το προφίλ σας.
- να κάνετε online παραγγελία και να παρακολουθείτε την πορεία της.
- να βρίσκετε το ιστορικό των online παραγγελιών σας.
- Αναζητήστε το προϊόν ΙΚΕΑ που επιθυμείτε με την χρήση φωτογραφίας.

Κατεβάστε την εφαρμογή IKEA Cyprus για να απολαύσετε αξέχαστες στιγμές αγορών τόσο από τα καταστήματά μας αλλά και από όποιον χώρο επιθυμείτε!

Για οποιαδήποτε πληροφορία επικοινωνήστε μαζί μας στο: app@ikea.com.cy

Our app is a seamless online marketplace designed to provide users with a diverse shopping experience from multiple brands and shops, all within a single platform. With a focus on convenience, security, and rewards, the app offers a range of features that make browsing and purchasing products simple and enjoyable.

- Secure Authentication: Users can create an account or log in using a username and password or conveniently through external identity providers such as Facebook, Google, or OneBank, ensuring quick and secure access to their personal accounts.

- Comprehensive Product Browsing: Shoppers can explore a vast selection of products from a variety of shops and brands. Users can find products by searching for a product or category or brand, by navigating through the available categories and product types or using recommendations, suggestions and product strips.

- Unified Checkout: The app supports single checkout for products from multiple shops, allowing users to shop from different retailers in one go. This simplifies the shopping experience, reducing the need for multiple transactions.

- Free Delivery & Returns (exclusions apply): To provide even more value, all purchases come with free delivery, and users can also enjoy free returns, making the shopping process worry-free and flexible.

- Earn Antamivi Points: Users who pay using Bank of Cyprus cards can earn Antamivi points with every purchase.

Vendora is the largest and fastest growing platform for buying and selling unique, handmade and pre-owned items in Greece, Cyprus and Bulgaria. Our huge community of passionate members are buying, upcycling or reselling products from over 20 categories.

Vendora is the ultimate marketplace for everyone. From collectors and enthusiasts to fashionistas and artists, it's your go-to platform to find, sell, and profit from unique items. 

Make extra money effortlessly by turning your hobbies and treasured belongings into a side hustle with Vendora.

For Collectors and Enthusiasts:
• Collectibles

• Musical Instruments

For Personal Use:

Buy via Vendora
Vendora acts as a trusted intermediary that collects, holds and releases the payment only when both parties are satisfied, eliminating the risk of fraud.

Are you a seller?
Sell quickly and safely to buyers in Greece, Bulgaria, and Cyprus. We take care of shipping labels and payments for you.

WHY DOWNLOAD THE GYMSHARK APP?

Turn on push notifications to be the first to know about new product launches, exclusive sporting goods, workout clothes, & fitness apparel drops, flash sales, & early-access promotions. Get notified the moment your favorite gym outfits & training gear restock, so you never miss out.

Track your orders & stay updated on your shipment status. Whether you're waiting on a fresh pair of squat-proof leggings, high-performance gym shorts, or seamless workout tops, you’ll always know exactly when your new gym clothes will arrive.

Save your must-have gym clothes, workout gear, & sporting goods in one convenient place. Build your ideal workout wardrobe by adding sportswear essentials to your wishlist, so you can easily shop later.

Unlock Gymshark-exclusive content, fitness tips, & special discounts through the app. You'll always have access to the latest workout clothes, sporting goods, & fitness fashion and trends.

More than just a clothing store, Gymshark is a movement. Be part of a global workout & fitness community that inspires, motivates, & supports your active lifestyle. Connect with fellow athletes, fitness enthusiasts, & professionals who share your passion for training, strength, & performance.
